title: Fork, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two-tined fork, round shoulders, baluster neck. Octagonal silver ferrule, flaring agate handle, octagonal in section, chamfered top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, silver, agate. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-121.
